overview: Farin came to Dhaka for university coaching and started staying at her aunt's house. A few days later she felt pain in her lower abdomen but she could not understand why this was happening. Meanwhile, while going to the coaching, she started getting chocolates in front of the door every day. Her uncle and aunt became worried about these unfortunate problems. After waking up suddenly one night, Farin realizes why all this was happening to her.
title: Biral Tapassya
